  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Introducció a la poesia a partir del rock català</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction to poetry through Catalan rock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in eine Poesie durch katalanischen 
Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction à la poésie par la roche 
catalanne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução à poesia através da rocha catalan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione a poesia attraverso la roccia 
catalan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στην ποίηση μέσω του καταλανικού βράχου</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>oc</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Webquest que proposa la recerca de música i poesia a través d'Internet i el descobriment de la poesia a través de les músiques i les lletres dels grups de rock català.</string>
            <string language="en">Webquest in which pupils look for music and lyrics on the internet and 'discover' poetry in the music and lyrics of Catalan rock.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ordinador</string>
            <string language="en">computer</string>
            <string language="es">ordenador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">poesia</string>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
            <string language="es">poesía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">rock</string>
            <string language="en">rock (music)</string>
            <string language="es">rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">anàlisi de text</string>
            <string language="en">textual analysis</string>
            <string language="es">análisis de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música vocal</string>
            <string language="en">vocal music</string>
            <string language="es">música vocal</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webquest, in dem Pupillen Musik und nach 
Lyriken auf dem Internet suchen und ' entdecken ' Poesie in der
Musik und in den Lyriken des katalanischen Felsens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest dans lequel les pupilles recherchent la 
musique et le lyrique sur l'Internet et 'découvrent 'la poésie dans 
la musique et le lyrique de la roche catalanne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquest em que as pupilas procuram a música e 
os lyrics no Internet e ' descobre ' a poesia na música e nos lyrics 
da rocha catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Webquest in cui le pupille cercano la musica ed i
lyrics sul Internet e 'scopre 'la poesia nella musica e nei lyrics 
della roccia catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Webquest στο οποίο οι μαθητές ψάχνουν τη μουσική
και τα λυρικά ποιήματα στο διαδίκτυο και "ανακαλύπτει" την ποίηση
στη μουσική και τα λυρικά ποιήματα του καταλανικού βράχου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsen (Musik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textanalyse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vocal Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ordinateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roche (musique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">analyse textuelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique vocale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">computador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rocha (música)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
